name: Death is Eternal
description:
I really should mention that this was made for Awful Jam and I ran out of time, so everything is borked.

Chill out and relax by helping the Starbaby usher souls on to the next life. Match 4 or more to give them the strength they need! Also try not to think about dying someday. It's ok! Life is temporary!


Controls!


ART and Programming

Shoehead

Music

Noyemi K

(Ps this game is broken)
